data.comment: Kortrijk kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Knowledge Musona (Eupen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Eupen with the kick-off.
Faiz Selemani is on a sub for Habib Gueye for Kortrijk.
In the minute 55, Kortrijk make their second substitution with Abdul Ajagun replacing Christophe Lepoint.
The away team replace Julien Ngoy with Mamadou Kone.
Faiz Selemani is booked for the home team.
In the minute 72, Carlos Embalo is replacing Isaac Nuhu for the away team.
Lucas Rougeaux (Kortrijk) gets a yellow card.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
Jens Cools (Eupen) has received a first yellow card.
